RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISE THE PRAISE off a step slow, fell further back to lag early, continued well back despite coming under a right handed crop through much of the turn, came widest for the drive, closed with a rush to be up in time. HIGH ARABIAN back off the pace in the two path, crept closer along the inside upper stretch,moved out, split foes a sixteenth out, finished willingly but was no match for the winner. CANT ATTACK ARCH pressed the issue early, chased the clear leader through the turn, remained closest to that one past the furlong marker, mild bid three wide late, could not match the top two in the waning strides. FUNKYLITTLESHACK broke sharp, showed the way up the backstretch off the inside, shook clear through the turn, continued to hold a daylight advantage past the midstretch point after some glib early fractions, caved in late. MISSHEARTBREAKER flashed early foot in the first flight along the inside, fell back into the turn, continued to save ground turn, went evenly through the lane. CRYPTO BRAVE back off the pace, moved out, four wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. CUSTOMIZED TWIN flashed early foot between foes, gave way late in the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, moved out, 4w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Missheartbreaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed early foot along the inside, fell back, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: High Arabian
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 2p turn, rallied, split foes, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Attack Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased turn, 3w, mild late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Customized Twin
ENTRY.COMMENT: early foot, gave way late turn

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Praise
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, lagged, roused mid turn, outside,with a rush

ENTRY.NAME: Funkylittleshack
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, shook clear turn, quick splits, caved late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARRANCA broke on top, cleared the opening furlong, continued to show the way through the turn under light restraint, drew off steadily under token encouragement to win ridden out. ROARING QUINN in mid pack in the run up the backstretch off the inside, two path turn, proved no match for the winner the final furlong, edged clear for the place. SHO NUFF chased the winner while racing outside, could do little with that rival through the lane, outkicked for the place, comfortably saved show. FINISHWHATUSTARTED behind the pace and inside the runner up, checked up in apparent tight quarters late in the turn, went evenly through the stretch after recovering. BYE BYE BIG BABY last away, remained always back while racing outside. ROADSIDE GIRL fell back to trail after the start and was never a factor. FOLLOWING A STEWARD'S INQUIRY AND A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF FINISHWHATUSTARTED AGAINST THE RUNNER UP FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE EXITING THE TURN, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Roadside Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Finishwhatustarted
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside, checked up rail 1/4, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Quinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack in the 2p, just off rail into the lane, no match,clr 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Barranca
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared early, drew out, token pressure,ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spanish Cross Stable, LLC & Dr. J. David Richardson

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Big Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back while racing outside

ENTRY.NAME: Sho Nuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner outside, no match, caught 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $50 ,000. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVIL'S HARVEST away in good order from the inside, showed the way out of the chute, set a moderate set of early fractions while rating, picked up the tempo into the far turn, slight drift through the lane, held late to narrowly prevail. GLUCKSTADT closest to the winner, continued to pursue that one into the straight, crept a bit closer past the furlong marker, saw that progress stall then was coming again late to just miss. BOURBON DAY lacked early foot, advanced off the inside to be closest to the top two upper straight, dove inside late, closed the gap late. TARAASHOQ void of speed for over six furlongs, displayed a modest amount of late interest to improve position. ZAICI settled behind the pace,had little left for the drive. RUN ON ACES also retreated through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Harvest
ENTRY.COMMENT: moderate pace inside, picked up tempo, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Gluckstadt
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, closer stretch, coming again late

ENTRY.NAME: Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: retreated stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Taraashoq
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, mild, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Zaici
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled behind pace, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, advanced, dove inside late, coming

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 24, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 24, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOOTH COLLIERY fell back after the start, began to advance three then four wide late in the turn, challenged outside of the lead pack when straightened for home, kicked well clear under steady handling. LT. BONURA lacked early foot, floated out five wide by the winner turning for home, late run to finish willingly and earn the place. BUNKIE'S SONG in the second flight while off the inside, came three wide for the drive, set down, late bid for the place between foes, not enough. DAAHERS BULLY forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch, challenged three wide late in the turn, weakened the final furlong. CURTIN'S UP sprinted clear soon after the start, showed the way into the turn, vied closest to the inside into the lane then gave way when headed. PRAY IDE SING chased the early leader, advanced and vied between horses late in the turn, weakened stretch. MOVE IT last away, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Colliery
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, advanced 3-4w late turn, drew well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, floated 5w into lane, willingly 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, vied btwn foes into lane, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Daahers Bully
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, vied 3w into lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Curtin's Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, pace, gave way inside when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight three wide, not enough 2nd while btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Move It
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWOFEXUSNEXUS broke alertly, showed the way early, joined by the runner up before a furlong, dueled outside that one into and through the turn, continued to battle through the lane, joined by a third foe from the outside, proved best in game fashion between those foes. ANGELIC KNIGHT moved up after the start to duel inside the winner, continued on equal terms with that one, held a narrow advantage in mid stretch, proved stubborn to the end. APRIORITY AVENGER in the second flight outside, slowly advanced and reached a striking position outside the top two by the furlong marker, late bid, not enough. RED IDOL in the second flight toward the inside, lost contact with the top three when straightened for home, finished up evenly. WHISKEY RED lacked early foot, improved four wide through the turn, flattened out through the stretch. MECKES PRIORITY fell back to trail after the start, five wide out of the turn, passed some tiring rivals well after the outcome had been decided. SAMURAI'S GRANDSON off a step slow, remained back. ALL COUNTRY in mid pack for three furlongs, backed up through the lane. VERDUNVILLE tired while racing four wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Angelic Knight
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to duel, long drive, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Samurai's Grandson
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Meckes Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5w into lane, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Red Idol
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight toward rail, no threat top three

ENTRY.NAME: All Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved 4w turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Avenger
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, late bid outside, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Verdunville
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired while four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Twofexusnexus
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled 2p, long drive, gamely btwn foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTMY MO JO WORKIN took command after the start, clear before a quarter, all the pace, drew out through the lane under steady handling. VIKING LEGACY void of early foot after being last away, saved some ground into the lane, steered out nearing midstretch, closed with a rush to be up for the second spot at the wire. GOLDENLUTE in mid pack early, some traffic into the turn, angled out to be five wide into the stretch, took over the second spot with less than a furlong remaining, caught by the runner up in the final jump. DIAL UNCLE JOEY chased the winner off the inside, proved no match for that one in the drive, faltered final furlong to lost a couple of positions. FIELD OF VISION went one paced throughout while saving ground. SMOOTH RIVER raced off the pace outside, four wide through the turn, failed to muster a rally through the lane. MEET KEVIN remained always back in failing to threaten. LITTLE PUCK forwardly placed for three furlongs, gave way three wide into the lane, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Field of Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout while saving ground

ENTRY.NAME: Gotmy Mo Jo Workin
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, all the pace,drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Goldenlute
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, some traffic into turn, angled 5w into lane,caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Little Puck
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward for three furlongs, gave way 4w, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Viking Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, steered out, with a rush for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Uncle Joey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Meet Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back in failing to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth River
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace outside, four wide turn, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN AMI brushed at the start to be last away, continued to trail early, advanced four wide through the turn, widest for the drive, finished full of run to be up in time. GOT ME A CHRYSLER behind the leaders toward the inside, patiently handled through the turn while continuing behind the first flight, split foes to challenge and lead late, nailed in the final strides. HAWAIIAN ARGUMENT within striking distance well out in the strip, challenged three wide late in the turn, showed the way past the furlong marker but could not last. CATCH ME T lacked speed off the rail, three wide for the drive, improved position a bit without posing a serious threat. SHAWN'S SOLVING in a bit tight at the start, moved up to set the pace, faltered when headed. PAL'S ALARM broke on top, relinquished the advantage, chased the leader into the turn, bid between horses, gave way in the drive. HEZA SEXY ZONG forwardly placed early, faded inside. REACH FOR THE ACES finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Reach for the Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, faded inside

ENTRY.NAME: Got Me a Chrysler
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the leaders, patient turn, split foes, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Catch Me T
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, three wide into the lane, improved bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Shawn's Solving
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight start, moved up to set pace, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Ami
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush,last away, back, 4w advance turn, full of run outside

ENTRY.NAME: Pal's Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, vied btwn into lane, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Hawaiian Argument
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastien Ronald J and Sebastien Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 3w bid into lane, led, could not last

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 24, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. ( Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSE PALACE away in good order, pressed the leader out of the chute to that one's outside, continued to prompt the issue through the turn, challenged three path into the lane, took over, quickly drove clear. DIANNA'S JET broke on top, showed the way out of the chute, continued set the pace into and through the turn while in the two path, offered but brief resistance to the winner when that one took over in upper stretch, proved no match, saved the place. LADY DREAMER settled off the pace and the inside, three wide exiting the turn, slow but steady gain on the runner up late. SHE A HOT MESS moved inside backstretch, saved ground turn, evenly through the lane in lacking a closing kick. SHELLI'S ANGEL failed to menace while racing four wide through the turn. BROKEN PROPOSAL finished early, trailed home to be well beaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace and rail, 3w for drive, steady gain 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: She a Hot Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved inside, saved ground, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Dianna's Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed the way out of chute, pace 2p, no match, saved 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, closest to leader, took over 3p, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Shelli's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace while racing four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Proposal
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home, well beaten

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIXIE FARMER broke in and a step slow, lacked speed in trailing, steered out to be four wide late in the turn, split foes nearing the furlong marker, kicked strongly clear. TDZ WHAT A DEAL away well, pressed the issue four wide turn, five wide into the stretch, challenged while widest and outside the winner with a furlong to run, could not match strides with that one to the wire, clear for the place. TDZ CORRIENDA STAR back off the pace, raced three wide into the stretch, rallied mildly through traffic, up late for the show. NON BINDING broke back, lacked speed, moved closer turning for home, bid a furlong out, faltered in the late going. APRIORITY GIRL broke on top, vied up front three wide, held a small advantage in the turn, weakened through the stretch. DRIFTING MELODIES moved up to vie up front along the inside, continued to battle through the lane, backed up steadily through the stretch. ALL AMERICAN PAT was never involved. ASTRO FLASH flashed brief speed between foes and gave way after three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Drifting Melodies
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to vie inside, backed up drive

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz Corrienda Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, three wide, mild rally thru traffic, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Non Binding
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, closer into lane, bid,led,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Farmer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, step slow, trailed, steered 4w, split foes,strongly clr

ENTRY.NAME: All American Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, vied three wide, led turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz What a Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pressed 4w turn, 5w into lane, no match, clear 2nd
